control.name: treeList1
control.description: The following code adds filters to the MRUFilters collection and applies one of these filters to the TreeList.

control.name: ceAllowFilter
control.description: Specifies whether nodes can be filtered.

control.name: cbFilterMode
control.description: Specifies a filter mode. In the 'Smart' filter mode, the TreeList displays all child nodes that match the filter criteria, whether or not their parent nodes match these criteria. In the 'Standard' mode, to show a particular child node, it is required that all its parent nodes must also match these filter criteria.

control.name: ceFilterEditor
control.description: Specifies whether the Filter Editor is enabled.

control.name: ceAutoFilterRow
control.description: Specifies whether the Auto Filter Row is displayed.

control.name: ceFilterList
control.description: The AllowMRUFilterList property specifies whether the TreeList's MRU Filter List is enabled.

control.name: ceColumnFilterList
control.description: The AllowColumnMRUFilterList property specifies whether recently used filter items are displayed in a Column's Filter DropDown.

control.name: ceAllowFindPanel
control.description: Displays or hides the Find Panel.
